test.name: Does the TA's metadata policy for an OP contain not valid values for the userinfo_signing_alg_values_supported parameter
test.description: In order to check the compliance of a metadata policy issued by the TA, an entity statement for an OP must be fetched in the entity's fetch endpoint. Once obtained the entity statement, the metadata_policy parameter is taken and the presence of the userinfo_signing_alg_values_supported parameter inside the openid_provider type is checked. The must not contain the values ['none', 'HS256', 'HS384', 'HS512']
